about_the_game:
Remake of a classic old-school hit from 80s, one of the first arcade games ever!

Seize the Grid!

Carve out your territory by strategically enclosing areas, but watch out for enemies as you strive to dominate the game board in this thrilling Xonix adventure.

Collect Power-Ups

Seize the opportunity to boost your power and score by collecting valuable bonuses strategically scattered across the grid, enhancing your chances of victory.

Evade the Threats!

Navigate through perilous mazes while dodging relentless adversaries, using cunning and agility to outmaneuver danger at every turn.

Reap the Spoils!

Strategically conquer territory and outmaneuver foes to earn lucrative rewards, fueling your progress and propelling you closer to triumph with each hard-fought victory.


It used to be super popular in its time and today we went further and added an extra dimension for more action – meet Xonix!

Modern 3D graphics in addition to classic, time proven qix gameplay will redefine your gaming experience!

Highlights:


  • Classic arcade game, super popular 90s hit
  • Completely reworked old-school retro hit (Qix)
  • Modern 3D graphics, optimized for mobile devices
  • 90 challenging levels
  • Smooth gameplay
  • Intuitive and easy to use controls
  • Action driven board battle
  • Kids friendly gaming environment

We all have played a variation of this retro game when we were kids - old-school fans should remember that 8-bit action - Gyropod, Scramble Spirits, Slither.io, Qix++, Lock'n'Chase, Avalanche - now it's a completely new 3D game with outstanding graphics and smooth intuitive controls!

You are piloting a hi-tech flying copter and your mission is to explore and capture territory, as much as possible. Copter can fly over the game field and leave a trail behind, so you need to draw rectangles with it and occupy enough of free space to beat the level.

But that sounds too easy, doesn't it? Yeah, that's why there are all those enemy drones on the field - they are moving all over the place trying to get in your way, so you'd better avoid them, or you're gonna get WHACKED!

Have we mentioned that there is also a time limit? Yeah, do it under a minute or - yeah, you know it - you're gonna get WHACKED!

However, there is also a good thing, lots of them actually - BONUSES and POWER UPS! Speed boosters and enemy slowers, extra coins, extra time and even extra life - go catch them all! But watch out, some could be kind of harmful though.

So, once again - fly with your copter, draw straight lines with its trail and capture all the free space you can to win the level! Beware of evil enemy drones on the field, don't let them hit you or your trail (you should not intersect it as well, by the way). Do each level under a minute or get some extra time and other bonuses and power ups, that will add more fun, action and excitement to the game!

Hi-tech flying Qix super copter is against evil enemy drones, you have dozens of exciting levels to beat! Each level has a unique layout and many enemy drones with different abilities, so definitely you won't get bored! We must warn you, it's getting harder with every new level, so you should improve your game to keep up with the action!
